title: U.S. Fighter Jet Shoots Down Iranian Drone Amid Heightened Tensions
summary_full: A U.S. fighter jet shot down the Iranian drone after it “unnecessarily maneuvered” toward the Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier.
summary_public: A U.S. fighter jet shot down the Iranian drone after it “unnecessarily maneuvered” toward the Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier.
